attributes.action: The People of East Belfast Call on Naomi Long to Resign Her Seat
attributes.additional_details:
The Alliance Party position on the union has often been unclear within the Unionist community, Alliance has recently offered its version of a Shared Future, it is time that the people of East Belfast took a vote on whether this is acceptable especially after the removal of the Union Flag.

Please sign the petition to let Naomi Long MP know that she should resign her east Belfast seat so that the Alliance Party policy can be put to the voters for democratic endorsement or otherwise.
